Waterfalls of data

tl;dr: I am a Data Scientist[title] and trainer[role]. I blog here and plan to collect links to places that educate me and where I educate.

As a mash-up of a data analyst, new machine learnest, and programmer, aka (to me) Data Scientist, I share my Python, R and advanced analytics experience internally, at Microsoft, and externally, too. I blog here. I add interesting content and link to more interesting content.
